name: Corpse Master
description:
free Yourself From the Darkness!


Raven was a common worker who one day got tired of his miserable life and decided to summon demons to fulfill his wish for a comfortable life, but what they did only brought him more headaches.

In Corpse Master you are rewarded with a huge arsenal of WEAPONS, ITEMS, ABILITIES, and UPGRADES to kill demon hatchlings and save Raven's skin and job.

Explore the wreckage of an abandoned bunker, a rotting sewer system and reach the Castle in Hell!

Improve Your Skills!


In Corpse Master, you can improve ALL YOUR ATTRIBUTES! Using coins and items you can choose upgrades for your stats, abilities like: Luck, Recycling, Stamina, Immunity and Speed, and even modify your weapons!

When you die, you lose your attributes, but you can use some strategies to recover some of them without trying!

Explore and Find Treasures!


The map is full of treasures, the more you look the more you will find. Treasures are the key to becoming more POWERFUL and preparing for boss battles.

Defeat the Corpse Master


The game can be completed in a matter of minutes. But it requires a lot of skill and strategy. Can you defeat Corpse Master?
